title: Cosmic Upheaval
summary: A game where you are an antimatter star trying to survive a hostile universe. Made in Gamemaker for a Texas Aggie Game Developers contest.
long_summary: A game where you are an antimatter star trying to survive a hostile universe. The Texas Aggie Game Developers held a contest where you had to make a game in the Gamemaker tool. I hadn't used Gamemaker before, but somehow a playable game emerged from my coding chaos!

gallery.caption: White dwarf stars make an appearance
Some of the bosses are somewhat menacing
